alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 2:24AM MST until December 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...SNOWY AND WINDY CONDITIONS TODAY... .Gusty winds and locally high snowfall rates will combine to produce difficult travel conditions tomorrow afternoon over portions of southwestern South Dakota, the Black Hills, and northeastern Wyoming. Falling and blowing snow will lead to reduced visibility and slippery road conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Bennett County and Oglala Lakota County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
